Content: This game is amazing, and I have been playing it for years. I would've given it 5 stars, but from the recent updates, the main page keeps showing me a connection problem. When I click it, it tells me connection error and check settings. I tried restarting the phone, deleting the app, and reinstalling it. Nothing works, and it's frustrating. I can't use certain surfers that I bought because it keeps showing me a loading symbol due to the error. Please fix this. UPDATE: SUPPORT SITE WONT OPEN!
